mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `note`(id, uid, cid, title, `text`, is_private) VALUES (#{id}, #{uid}, #{cid}, #{title}, #{text}, #{isPrivate})
mapper.update:
UPDATE note
title = #{title},
`text` = #{text},
is_private = #{isPrivate},
cid = #{cid},
update_time = #{updateTime}
WHERE id = #{id} and uid = #{uid}
mapper.select: select n.*, COALESCE(c.name, '默认分组') AS category from note n left join category c on n.cid = c.id where n.uid = #{uid} and n.is_private = 0;
